Events that occurred on 27 January.

content.title: On Earth
content.content:
1819 - John Benjamin Tolkien dies.
1969 - Actor and author Cliff Broadway is born.
1989 - Voice actor David Buck dies.
2004 - The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King is nominated for eleven Academy Awards.
2017 - Actor John Hurt dies.
